patterns: What majors available in MPU?
What degree program available?
What programs can have from MPU?
What diploma degree can have from MPU?
responses: The Myanmar Pioneer University offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses for bachelor`s, diploma, master`s and doctoral level students in a wide range of subject areas: software engineering, high performance computing, business information system, communication and networking, embedded systems and computer systems technology.

patterns: What majors available for diploma program?
What subjects can take in diploma program?
Diploma program in MPU
responses: The Myanmar Pioneer University offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses for bachelor`s, diploma, master`s, and doctoral level students in a wide range of subject areas: software engineering, high performance computing, business information system, communication and networking, embedded systems and computer systems technology. Only Bachelor`s Degree holders with the IT related fields are allowed to apply for this course. The government employees need to submit the actual signature of the superior government officer. All students have to pass the entrance examination.

patterns: How long does it take to complete degree program?
How long does it take to complete SE, BIS, KE, HPC, CN, ES, CSec program?
How long does it take to complete computer science degree?
How long does it take to complete bachelor`s degree program?
responses: The standard academic calendar consists of two semesters. The first semester of the academic year normally starts in December and ends in April. The second semester starts in May and finishes in September. The table below presents the basic chronological structure of the two main semesters in any academic year.

patterns: How long does it take to complete diploma program?
How long does it take to complete SE, BIS, KE, HPC, CN, ES, CSec diploma program?
How long does it take to complete computer science diploma degree?
How long does it take to complete bachelor`s degree diploma program?
responses: A post graduate diploma aims to provide a qualification typically awarded after a bachelor`s degree. The program is 42 weeks intensive sessions, including a required paid internship. It consists of a vocational course after an academic program. All university graduates are eligible to enroll and study for a postgraduate diploma. They have to complete 42 weeks intensive session in order to qualify for the PGD. Internships are paid. Our internship coordinator will work with students to secure the best internship for each individual.

patterns: Which subjects have to take on MPU Under Graduate Diploma in Information Technology (Dip.IT)?
Which course will be available on MPU under graduate diploma in information technology (Dip.IT)?
subjects/course in Under Graduate Diploma (Dip.IT)
responses: For FC Courses, Calculus (Dip-01201), Discrete (Dip-01202), Algebra & Probability (Dip-01203), Numerical Analysis (Dip-01204), Graph & Linear Programming (Dip-02205) and Inventory Control, Queuing Theory & Game Theory (Dip-02206) subjects are available. For FCS courses, Computer Applications Technology– Word, Excel, Desktop Presentation: Power Point (Dip-01101), Data Structure Fundamentals (Dip-01102), Operating System and Configuration (Dip-01103), Desktop Application Development (C++, Java) (Dip-01104), Human Interface Design & Technology (Multimedia Interface) (Dip-02105), Data Structure &  Algorithms (Dip-02106), Programming Languages & Type of Language Processors (Dip-02107) and Artificial Intelligent / AI Technologies (Dip-0108) are available. For FIS courses, Database Technology (Dip-01301), Coporate Accounting, Ethics and Legal Affair (Dip-01302), Business and System Strategy (Dip-01303), Coporate Activities & Project Management (Dip-01304), Business Process Management & eBusniess (Dip-02305), Software Development Methodologies (Dip-02306), Service Management and System Audit (Dip-02307), Web Application Development (HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP) (Dip-02308) subjects are available. For FCST courses, Introduction to Computer System (Dip-01401), Computer Networking (Dip-01402), Security (Dip-01403), Advanced Computer Networking (Dip-02404), Computer Network Security (Dip-02405) courses are available.

patterns: Which subjects have to take on MPU Post Graduate Diploma for Web Engineering?
Which course will be available on MPU post graduate diploma for web engineering?
subjects/course in Post Graduate Diploma for Web Engineering
responses: The faculty of MPU offers post graduate diploma in the following subjects: Web System Development, Operation System Management, Basic Web Programming, Human Computer Interaction, Database Design and Development, Client-Side Web Programming, Ajax and Web Service, Advanced Web Programming (PHP, Joomala), Web System Design Architecture, Project Management, Advanced Web Programming using Java Technology (MVC, Multi-tier , OR Mapping), E-Business Technique, Performance Computing, Android Application Development, Internal Project (Individual & Group) and 12-week paid Internship included.

patterns: Which subjects have to take on MPU Post Graduate Diploma for Network Engineering?
Which course will be available on MPU post graduate diploma for network engineering?
subjects/course in Post Graduate Diploma for Network Engineering
responses: The Postgraduate Diploma program aims to impart the skill and knowledge to graduates who wish to broaden their knowledge in the subject they studied at undergraduate level. During the network engineering course, the students will receive internship opportunities with an employer so they can get some really good experience in the workplace. Network Engineers are involved in the design and maintenance of the hardware and software necessary for a computer network. A network engineer is a highly specialized individual who deals with all aspects of networks and cloud computing. The course is a 10-month program including 12-week internship sessions.

patterns: What opportunities available in Software Engineering?
What careers available after SE degree?
Software Engineering Career
What are the career paths for SE?
se career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Software Engineering, you can work as a Software Engineer or Project Manager or System Analysts or Software Developer / Programmer or Software Tester or Technical Support or Middle ware Analyst.

patterns: What opportunities available in Business Information Systems?

Business Information Systems Career
What are the career paths for BIS?
bis career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Business Information Systems, you can work as a Business Process Analyst or Project Manager or System Analysts or IT Consultant or Information System Manager or Quality Control managers or Application Engineers and more.

patterns: What opportunities available in Knowledge Engineering?

Knowledge Engineering Career
What are the career paths for KE?
ke career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Knowledge Engineering, you can work as an Search Engine & Game Developer or Knowledge Architect or Expert & Robotic System Developer or Linguistics Experts or Computer Graphic System Developer or Simulator System Developer.

patterns: What opportunities available in High Performance Computing?
What careers available after HPC degree?
What are the career paths for HPC?
High Performance Computing Career
hpc career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in High Performance Computing, you can work as a System Engineer or IT Engineer in Data Center or High Performance Computing (HPC) Test Engineer or Technical Consulting on HPC System or HPC Software Engineer or HPC System Solution Architect or HPC Applications Engineer or HPC System Administrator or Mobile Application Developer (in the Cloud) or Big Data Application Developer or Cloud Specialist Architect.

Computer Networking Career

cn career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Computer Networking, you can work as an IT Manager or IT Engineer or Management Consulting or Network Analyzer or Telecommunication Engineer or Networking professionals or Network Expert.

patterns: What opportunities available in Embedded System?

Embedded System Career
What are the career paths for ES?
es career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Embedded System, you can work as an System Engineer or System Validation Firmware Design Engineer or System Software Engineer or Application Software Engineer or Firmware Engineer or Application Engineer or Security and Firmware Architect or Embedded Firmware Architect.

patterns: What opportunities available in Cyber Security?
What careers available after CSec degree?
Cyper Security Career
What are the career ptaths for CSec?
csec career
responses: After finished Bachelor of Computer Science in Cyber Security, you can work as an Cyber Security Architect or Cyber Security Administrator or Information Security Analyst or Computer and Information system manager or Network Security analyst or Cybersecurity Engineer or Cybersecurity Analyst or Information Security officer or Penetration Tester/Ethical hacker or Cybersecurity Specialist.

patterns: What are academic rules?
What rules have to follow to accomplish the degree programs?
What rules have to follow to accomplish the diploma programs?
responses: MPU uses a Semester-wise Credit System. For more details, please contact MPU student affairs.

patterns: What kind of collaborations are available for industry?
Industry Collaboration
responses: MPU has established academic collaboration with the following industries: Fujitsu Limited, Japan OAS Corporation Ltd., Japan, Cross-border International Education Support Foundation (CIESF), Japan, Hitachi Limited, Japan, Acroquest Myanmar Co., Ltd., Japan, International Electric Vehicle Expo Organizing Committee (IEVEOC) – Korea, Myanmar Electrical and Electronic Association-Myanmar, Access Spectrum.

patterns: What kind of collaborations are available for universities?
University Collaboration
responses: MPU has established academic collaboration with the following universities: Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (JAIST), Saitama University, Japan, Nagaoka University of Technology, Japan, Okayama University, Japan, Aoyama Gakuin University, Japan, The Faculty of Engineering, University of the Ryukyus, Japan, Graduate School of International Management, International University of Japan (IUJ), Japan, Kwangwoon University, Korea, Korea Aerospace University, Korea, Dongseo University, Korea, Busan Digital University, Korea, Jeju National University, Korea, Suan Sunandha Rajabhat University, Thailand, Malaysia University of Science and Technology (MUST), Malaysia, Nagoya Institute of Technology.

patterns: What are the requirements for student registrations?
admission requirements
student registration requirements
responses: The students are to get at least 450 marks in the Matriculation Examination to apply to the MPU. The candidates from all over Myanmar are applicable. The time to join this university is in December. The basic requirements are 4 photographs of the applicant, copies and the original NRC of the applicant and copies of parents` NRC and Copy and Original of Matriculation Exam Mark Receipt.

patterns: What labs are available in MPU?
What kind of researches are on-going?
research labs
responses: In MPU, these research labs are on-going. Cloud Computing System (CCS) lab, Data Analysis and Managment (DAM) lab, Digital Signal Processing (DSP) lab, Knowledge Engineering (KE) lab, Data Computing (DC) lab, Artificial Intelligence (AI) lab, Internet of Things (IOT) lab, Enterprise Software Engineering (SE) lab, High Performance Computing (HPC) lab, Communication and Networking (CN) lab, Science of Data: Computing and Algorithm (CA) lab and Business Information System (BIS) labs.

patterns: What is Cloud Computing System lab (CCS)?
What cloud computing system lab (CCS) provided?
cloud computing system lab (ccs)
responses: The mission of the Cloud Computing System (CCS) lab are to manage transformative research on the Cloud ecosystem and improve innovative technologies and to gain knowledge from MPU students about various features of Cloud Computing platform such as Amazon Web Service (AWS), Google App Engine, Microsoft Windows Azure and open-source software platforms and solve Big Data and Big Compute problems of Today. Topic research are Mobile Cloud Computing, Encrytpion, Data security, Big Data Analytics, Big Data Clustering, Virtual Computing and Infrastructure Management for the Services.

patterns: What is Data Analysis and Management (DAM) lab?
What Data Analysis and Management lab (DAM) provided?
data analysis and management lab (dam)
responses: Data Analysis and Management (DAM) research lab intends to support data analysis solutions which are needed by academic and governmental sectors as well as industrial sector. Research areas are Tex Mining and Analytics, Data Analytics and Learning and Big Data Analytics.

patterns: What is Digital Signal Processing (DSP) lab?
What Digital Signal Processing (DSP) lab provided?
digital signal processing (dsp) lab
responses: The mission of Digital Signal Processing (DSP) lab are to analyze and design systems employing digital signal processing techniques and to provide the extensive use of MATLAB based examples that illustrate the program’s powerful capability to solve signal processing problems. Research topcis are video processing, image processing and speech recognition.

patterns: What is Knowledge Engineering (KE) lab?
What Knowledge Engineering (KE) lab provided?
knowledge engineering (ke) lab
responses: The mission of Knowledge Engineering (KE) lab are to develop concepts of knowledge engineering and intelligent system and train data and knowledge management skills to MPU students and to attempt to take on challenges and solve problems that would usually require a high level of human expertise to solve. Research topics are Linguistics: Knowledge Engineering for NLP, Semantic Web and Ontology Engineering, Agents Programming (Aglets/JADE), Co-word Analysis and Information and knowledge engineering.

patterns: What is Data Communication (DC) lab?
What Data Communication (DC) lab provided?
data communication (dc) lab
responses: The mission of Data Communication (DC) lab are to know ethical hacking methodology, generalized exploit techniques, basic network concepts, networking vulnerabilities and countermeasures and to develop main cryptographic methods for communication and computer system security. Research topics are wireless sensor networks, computer network security, Cryptography, Cloud Computing Networking, Network Security & Management and Distributed Processing & Networks.

patterns: What is Artificial Intelligence (AI) lab?
What Artificial Intelligence (AI) lab provided?
artificial intelligence (ai) lab
responses: The mission of Artificial Intelligence (AI) lab are to overcome language barriers by Machine translation and the resources of Myanmar NLP from MPU AI Lab can be used freely for educational purposes, other research users and many other related fields. Research topics are Myanmar to English Machine Translation, Myanmar Information Retrieval, Myanmar Text Summarization, Myanmar Text Categorization, Myanmar Word Sense Disambiguation, Myanmar Search Engine and Myanmar OCR (including Handwritten Recognition).

patterns: What is Internet of Things (IoT) lab?
What Internet of Things (IoT) lab provided?
internet of things (iot) lab
responses: The mission of Internet of Things (Iot) lab are to enable faculty learning, research and hands-on experimentation to discover and demonstrate the promise of the Internet of Things and to impart fundamental and advanced training on IoT to upcoming students. Research topics are Smart Car-parking System, Flood Monitoring System and Smart Home System.

patterns: What is Enterprise Software Engineering (SE) lab?
What Enterprise Software Engineering (SE) lab provided?
enterprise software engineering (se) lab
responses: The aim of Internet of Things (Iot) lab is to develop a broad understanding of the discipline of software engineering and to understand the issues affecting the organization, planning and control of software-based system development. Research areas are software size estimation, requirements, including safety and quality requirements, software modeling and architecture, safety/ security analysis of intelligent systems / sociotechnical systems, machine learning, including reinforcement learning and deep learning, software verification and model checking using formal method.

patterns: What is High Performance Computing (HPC) lab?
What High Performance Computing (HPC) lab provided?
high performance computing (hpc) lab
responses: The aim of High Performance Computing (HPC) lab is to provide to write faster code for modern multi-core processors and clusters and to provide to write faster code for modern multi-core processors and clusters. Topics of research are Parallel & Distributed Systems, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Mobile and UbiqMPUous Computing, Computer Network and Management and Distributed System and Distributed Programming.

patterns: What is Communication and Networking (CN) lab?
What Communication and Networking (CN) lab provided?
communication and networking (cn) lab
responses: The aim of Communication and Networking (CN) lab is to identify the components required to build different types of networks and to understand how the data transferred from source to destination. The objectives of this lab are to understand fundaments underlying principles of computer networking, to understanding details and functionality of layered network architecture, to analyze performance of various communication protocols and to practice packet/file transmission between nodes.

patterns: What is Science of Data: Computing and Algorithm (SoD) (CA) lab?
What Science of Data: Computing and Algorithm (SoD) (CA) lab provided?
science of data: computing and algorithm (sod) (ca) lab
science of data (sod) (ca) lab
responses: The vision of Science of Data: Computing and Algorithm (SoD) or (CA) lab is soul of science research. The mission is to provide quality, affordable, and sustainable data science and provide science and technology advances including research, education and service. Topics of research are Managing and analyzing big data, Statistical Thinking, creating algorithms and computing, solving real-life problems using machine learning.

patterns: What is Business Information System (BIS) lab?
What Business Information System (BIS) lab provided?
business information system (bis) lab
responses: The mission of Business Information System (BIS) lab are to provide students from all business disciplines with a general background of BIS and to demonstrate an understanding of the foundations of information systems and explain the reasons for the current design and use of information systems. Topics of research are Business intelligence, Digital innovation, transformation and disruption, E-Commerce, Mobile-Commerce, Data privacy and Enterprise systems.

patterns: What is opening hours of MPU library?
MPU library
library opening hours
responses: The Myanmar Pioneer University is open from Monday to Friday. January to December: 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. The faculty members, students, and staff from Myanmar Pioneer University are entitled to membership of the MPU Library. New members will need to register at the library by completing a registration form. The following documentation is also required Student/Staff ID Card and One Passport Photo. Types of Members are Faculty Member, Admin/Professional Staff, Non-Academic and Students. As study space, allow for both individual and group work are available, provided desks for study, research, writing and discussion, provided more than 20 sets of laptops are provided for study, research and writing.
